item.title: Photographer/Videographer for Chiropractic Office Ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled photographer/videographer to capture captivating visuals of our doctors for use in our advertising campaigns. The job requires you to come to our chiropractic office located in Cypress, TX (NW Houston) and take professional photographs and videos of our physicians in action. The visuals will be used in online ads, social media promotions, and on our website to showcase the expertise and professionalism of our doctors. This is a great opportunity for a talented photographer/videographer to showcase their skills and work with a reputable healthcare organization.

Skills required:
- Photography
- Videography
- Lighting and composition
- Post-processing/editing skills

Experience in capturing professional visuals for advertising purposes is highly preferred.

Hourly Range: $33.00-$77.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 23:11 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Photography
Skills: Adobe Photoshop, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography, Photography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Short Form Video Editor | Instagram/Facebook Reels - Upwork
item.description:
I have a small Marketing and Video Production Agency that is quickly growing. A large portion of what I offer is social media management with a heavy focus on reels, these are mainly short 15-30 second videos that are timed to a trending piece of music that fits the brand.
They may also be interview shorts where audio and backing music is preferred.

At the moment I'm a one person operation and cover all aspects of the business and what I need is for someone to help with some of the editing so I can free up some time to grow the business.

If this goes well I very much see the opportunity becoming a regular thing.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 23:08 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Instagram Reels, Video Editing, Adobe After Effects, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing
Country: NZL

item.title: Video editor for vacation trip highlight video - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for someone to make a cool video of our (3 boys) trip to the Philippines. We have a bunch of awesome photos and videos that we want to put together into a 3-5 minute video. We even have some cool drone shots too. Let me know if you think we have enough material.

The idea is that we don't really look at the photos that much after the trip, so we want a highlight video that's easy to watch and remember the best moments. We also want it to look great on social media, to make our friends and strangers jealous 😁

- The video should be horizontal, not vertical. But if you think vertical is better, let me know, I'm open to suggestions.
- You don't have to only include footage of us, you can also include shots of the beautiful scenery and different places we visited.
- I want the video to be fun and engaging to watch.
- If possible, it would be nice to show the different parts of the Philippines we visited (Coron, El Nido, Moalboal, Bohol, and Siargao), but it's not a must.
- There are some live photos that can be used as videos, feel free to use them if you think it works.
- I don't want to limit your creativity, so feel free to add your own touch 😁

We are looking for someone who has some experience with video editing and can show us he/she will do a good job, through previous work. Please attach some of the work you have done when you apply for this job :)

Here is a link to all of the photos and videos that we took, it's quite a lot but most of it is repeated photos:

https://photos.app.goo.gl/E9esmpP1Ce2LXKyq7

Some of these photos are "live" photos, which can be used as videos, if you feel it's a good idea.

Lastly, please give us also an estimate of how long it will take approximately.

Thank you in advance!

Hourly Range: $10.00-$30.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 22:58 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Education, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Education, Video Post-Editing, Videography, Video Production
Country: Cyprus
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Boxing Gym 10 Year Anniversary Party Recap - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor for Boxing Gym 10 Year Anniversary Party Recap

**Position:** Video Editor

**Project:** 10 Year Anniversary Recap Boxing Gym  (45 seconds)

**Deadline:** 24 hours from hiring

**Description:**
We are looking for a talented video editor to create a dynamic 45-second recap video for the boxing gym 10 Year Anniversary party. The video will highlight shots of the gym, the people, and include slow-motion clips. The video should start with the two owners at the front of the gym opening the doors for the camera.

**Responsibilities:**
- Edit the provided footage into a compelling 45-second recap video.
- Begin the video with the two owners opening the gym doors. (CLIP IS NAMED C0218)
- Include shots of the gym and people, with a mix of regular and slow-motion (120/60 fps) clips.
- Add background music to enhance the video.
- Ensure the video is optimized for social media platforms, 1920x1080.

**Deliverables:**
- Final exported video (45 seconds)
- Editing sequence/project file (MUST EDIT ON ADOBE PREMIERE PRO)

**Requirements:**
- Proven experience in video editing with a portfolio showcasing similar projects.
- Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro)
- Ability to work quickly and efficiently to meet tight deadlines.
- Strong creative skills to create a captivating recap video using slow-motion effects.

**Application Process:**
- Please provide links to your portfolio or previous work relevant to this project.
- Confirm your availability to complete the video within 24 hours of hiring.
- Include a brief description of your approach to editing recap videos and incorporating slow-motion effects and music.

**Footage:**
Here is the link to the footage that needs to be edited: https://we.tl/t-EFWo3Lg6vx


Budget: $20
Posted On: June 24, 2024 22:53 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Videography
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects, Videography
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Videographer for Media Interviews : June 26 in NYC - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer to capture interviews with senior business leaders for RETHINK Retail. Interviews will be conducted at multiple sites in Manhattan on Wednesday, June 26...with a possible extension of 1 additional day, either Thursday or Friday. The videographer will be responsible for providing the equipment, setting up the equipment, managing the lighting and sound, and recording high-quality footage of the interviews. The videographer and equipment must be mobile–we will be shooting in multiple places during the day.

The final deliverables will be the raw audio and video(s) footage (we will not need editing). This is a great opportunity to showcase your videography skills and work with influential business leaders.

Requirements:
  - Bring and set up your own equipment: Cameras (2 minimum, 3 preferred), Lighting, Handheld Microphones (2 minimum), Lav Microphones (2 minimum)  
  - Proven experience as a videographer
  - Proficiency in operating professional video equipment
  - Strong understanding of lighting and sound techniques
  - Excellent communication and collaboration skills
  - Ability to work efficiently under tight deadlines

Hourly Range: $50.00-$100.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 22:49 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Business, Videography
Skills: Business, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Creator for an animated bible channel (AI) - Upwork
item.description:
*Budget is Monthly

Looking for a skilled and seasoned video editor to manage the entire video creation process, generating top-notch YouTube content/videos that are approximately 10-15 minutes long, animated content with vivid AI images, with 10 videos produced monthly. The position includes research & script writing (outline and topic ideas sent by us).  Please review this carefully before applying for the position.

The ideal candidate or team will have prior experience working on YouTube automation channels with measurable success. They should possess extensive knowledge of YouTube guidelines, copyright rules, and fair use policies, strong editing capabilities, access to Stock Footage sites, as well as familiarity with VidIQ or Tubebuddy. The videos must be eligible for monetization.

We Want to Work With You If:
- Keen ability to create interesting scripts based on biblical topics
-Strong understanding of Christian theology and bible verses
- You have a history of creating binge-worthy content on YouTube.
- You know how to maintain viewer engagement through good pacing, transitions, etc.
- You have experience working effectively under tight deadlines.
- You prioritize high-quality work with minimal revisions.
- You are organized, communicative and can work quickly.
- You are able to deliver materials via Google Drive or Trello.


Video Requirements:

- Video workflow should include a 10-second teaser intro, channel intro, follow on IG/subscribe pop-ups, engaging and entertaining content in the body with funny editing, and ending with channel end screens.
- Incorporate copyright-free sound effects and background music appropriately.
- Utilize copyright-free clips and licensed stock footage.
- Edit videos in a captivating style for the audience, focusing on Click-Through Rate (CTR) and retention rate, 1080p HD+, and include lower-thirds, text, and transitions as needed.
- Only use professional video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, DaVinci Resolve, or Final Cut Pro.
-Manage Voiceover productions

Why We're Great to Work With:

- You'll enhance your portfolio with a variety of professional video samples.
- We uphold high-quality standards.
- Work remotely from wherever you prefer (as long as you're reachable).
- There's plenty of work available, with no restrictions on the amount you can edit.
- We value talent.

Job Requirements:

- Deliver 15 Videos Monthly
- Videos should be at 10-15 minutes long.
- Compensation of $50 per video.

Priority will be given to the video editor who best aligns with the job description. The budget is $50 per video.

Please provide your current portfolio or sample work for review.


Budget: $500
Posted On: June 24, 2024 22:49 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Adobe After Effects, 2D Animation, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Content Creator for Fashion Sport Brands - Upwork
item.description:
We are a fashion sport brand that caters to active males in the gym, soccer, fight sports, MMA, boxing, and kickboxing. We are looking for talented content creators who can produce engaging and high-quality content for our advertisements. As a content creator, you will be responsible for conceptualizing, shooting, and editing videos and images that showcase our brand and products in an exciting and dynamic way.

item.title: Video Editor Wanted for Back Pain Resolved Online - Upwork
item.description:
Video Editor Wanted for Back Pain Resolved Online

Back Pain Resolved Online is seeking a dedicated and skilled video editor to join our team for an ongoing project. The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing, adding medically accurate b-roll footage, and managing social media content.

Responsibilities:
- Edit videos provided by our team and enhance them with medically accurate b-roll footage
- Upload edited videos to OpusPro and schedule posts
- Create spreadsheets with links to the videos and upload them to a social media manager for static image posts
- Create engaging text posts for social media platforms
- Collaborate with our team to ensure timely delivery of high-quality content

Requirements:
- Proven experience in video editing, preferably with a focus on medical or health-related content
- Familiarity with OpusPro and social media management tools
- Ability to source and incorporate medically accurate b-roll footage
- Proficiency in creating spreadsheets and managing content links
- Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
- Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently or as part of a team
- Willingness to learn and adapt to our company's specific requirements


If you are a dedicated, detail-oriented video editor with a passion for creating high-quality, medically accurate content, we encourage you to apply. Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining why you would be a great fit for this position.

We look forward to reviewing your application and potentially welcoming you to the Back Pain Resolved Online team!

item.ns0:encoded:
Video Editor Wanted for Back Pain Resolved Online

Back Pain Resolved Online is seeking a dedicated and skilled video editor to join our team for an ongoing project. The ideal candidate will have experience in video editing, adding medically accurate b-roll footage, and managing social media content.

Responsibilities:
- Edit videos provided by our team and enhance them with medically accurate b-roll footage
- Upload edited videos to OpusPro and schedule posts
- Create spreadsheets with links to the videos and upload them to a social media manager for static image posts
- Create engaging text posts for social media platforms
- Collaborate with our team to ensure timely delivery of high-quality content

Requirements:
- Proven experience in video editing, preferably with a focus on medical or health-related content
- Familiarity with OpusPro and social media management tools
- Ability to source and incorporate medically accurate b-roll footage
- Proficiency in creating spreadsheets and managing content links
- Strong attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
- Excellent communication skills and the ability to work independently or as part of a team
- Willingness to learn and adapt to our company's specific requirements


If you are a dedicated, detail-oriented video editor with a passion for creating high-quality, medically accurate content, we encourage you to apply. Please submit your resume, portfolio, and a brief cover letter explaining why you would be a great fit for this position.

We look forward to reviewing your application and potentially welcoming you to the Back Pain Resolved Online team!

item.title: Instagram Caption Writing, Viral Video Research & Short Form Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello there!

My name is Izzak, an online digital markting entrepreneur and word traveller who is looking for a superstar content manager to:
- source viral reels,
- discover viral hooks & upload viral videos to organised folder that will be used for future edits / posts
- Identify trending audio
- Write captions based off other successful posts
- Edit short form content
- Come up with content ideas yourself that would fit my branding

This is perfect if you:
Have experience with finding viral content / hooks
Are organised
Have high speed internet
Can find trending audios that match my personal branding
Can rewrite captions from other successful viral videos

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
